trans-unit.source: Contains the HTML cascading-style sheets (CSS) inline style attributes for a specified HTML server control.
This class cannot be inherited.
Any style declared for a particular HTML server control is added to the collection when the containing Web Forms page is parsed.
It automatically parses and exposes CSS properties through a dictionary pattern API.
You can manipulate any CSS property on a server control through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.Style%2A> property.
Simply use the CSS property's key and value in the indexed collection.
Adds a style item to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection"></xref> of a control using the specified name/value pair.

If the style item to add exists in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterStyle> enumeration, use the overload of the <xref:System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection.Add%2A> method that takes an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterStyle> parameter because it is strongly typed.
This means that items that are added will be included when viewing items with the get accessor of the <xref:System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection.Item%2A> property.
The name of the new style attribute to add to the collection.
The value of the style attribute to add to the collection.
key is `null`.

Adds a style item to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection"></xref> collection of a control using the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterStyle"></xref> enumeration value and corresponding value.

If the style item to add exists in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterStyle> enumeration, use this <xref:System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection.Add%2A> overload of the <xref:System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection.Add%2A> method rather than the overload that does not take an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterStyle> parameter.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterStyle"></xref> enumeration value to add to the collection.
The value of the style attribute to add to the collection.
Removes all style items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection"></xref> object.
Gets the number of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection"></xref> object.
The number of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the specified CSS value for the HTML server control.
The index to the CSS attribute.
The value of key.
Gets or sets the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterStyle"></xref> value for the HTML server control.

Style items that are added programmatically to a <xref:System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection> collection for a control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection.Item%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection.Add%2A> method that take an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterStyle> enumeration value as an input are included in the count of style items that are returned with the <xref:System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection.Count%2A> property and are included with the string literal that is returned with the <xref:System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection.Value%2A> property.
These attributes are strongly typed.
If the cascading style sheet attribute that you want to add to a server control exists in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterStyle> enumeration, use these strongly typed methods.

If the attribute you want to add does not exist in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterStyle> enumeration, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection.Item%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection.Add%2A> method.

Trying to access an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterStyle> enumeration value in the <xref:System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection> of a control that has not been added or to access a CSS attribute that has been added with the <xref:System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection.Item%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection.Add%2A> method, returns `null` using the <xref:System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection.Item%2A> property.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterStyle"></xref>.
The value key; otherwise, `null`, if key is not in the server control's collection.
Gets a collection of keys to all the styles in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection"></xref> object for a specific HTML server control.
A collection of keys contained in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection"></xref> for the specified HTML server control.
Removes a style item from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection"></xref> of a control using the specified style key.
The string literal of the style item to remove.

Removes a style item from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection"></xref> collection of a control using the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterStyle"></xref> enumeration value to remove.
Gets or sets the value of the `style` attribute of the HTML server control.
The style string literal.
